    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) double alpha
      A parameter for controlling learning regular.
      (专用程序包) double[][] itemSubspace
      The item matrix V.
      (专用程序包) double lambda
      A parameter for controlling the learning speed.
      (专用程序包) double meanRating
      Mean rating calculated from the training sets.
      static int NO_REGULAR
      No regular scheme.
      (专用程序包) int numItems
      Number of items.
      (专用程序包) int numRatings
      Number of ratings.

      Number of users.
      static int PQ_REGULAR
      No regular scheme.
      (专用程序包) java.util.Random rand
      Used to generate random numbers.
      (专用程序包) int rank
      The low rank of the small matrices.
      (专用程序包) double ratingLowerBound
      The lower bound of the rating value.
      (专用程序包) double ratingUpperBound
      The upper bound of the rating value.
      (专用程序包) int regularScheme
      Regular scheme.
      static java.lang.String SPLIT_SIGN
      A sign to help reading the data file.
      (专用程序包) Triple[][] testingData
      Testing data.
      (专用程序包) Triple[][] trainingData
      Training data.
      (专用程序包) double[][] userSubspace
      The user matrix U.

                             int paraNumUsers,

                             double paraRatingLowerBound,
                             double paraRatingUpperBound,
                             double paraTrainingFraction)
        The first constructor.
        参数:
        paraFilename - The data filename.
        paraNumUsers - The number of users.
        paraNumItems - The number of items.
        paraNumRatings - The number of ratings.

      • adjustUsingMeanRating

        public void adjustUsingMeanRating()
        Adjust the training data with the mean rating. The ratings are subtracted with the mean rating. So do the rating bounds.

      • readTestingData
